string.name: welcome_btn
string.b: I WANT TO GIVE A HAND

resources.string: This application was developed by the ACM Student Chapter of University of Moratuwa with the aim of assisting Sri Lanka in the fight against COVID-19.We express our heartfelt gratitude towards our development crew for their immense support for our journey towards reaching our goal.
ACM is an international learned society for computing that was founded in 1947. As a student chapter of ACM, we always strive to use our skills for the betterment of the society.
YOUR PHONE NUMBER WILL BE USED TO CONTACT YOU IF YOU WERE FOUND AROUND A PATIENT
WE HAVE SENT AN OTP NUMBER TO VERIFY YOUR MOBILE NUMBER. PRESS LOGIN TO ENTER THE OTP NUMBER
ALLOW goSAFE STORE YOUR MOBILE NUMBER IN ITS SECURE REGISTRY
The code we send to you will expire in 60 seconds. You can tap on the resend option that will appear on your screen after 60 seconds to retry or recheck your mobile number
Enabling this feature will help us keep you safer. But note that it will consume more power
